docs.title: Bayesian Paired Samples
docs.text:
Welcome to the Bayesian Paired Samples package documentation.

Here you will find the documentation for the package's functions:

  • densBB Function
  • Error One Function
  • Error Two Function
  • Evidence Beta Function

docs.title: densBB Function
docs.text: This function calculates the Beta-Binomial distribution density.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text:
• X1: Numeric value representing the first observation.
  • X2: Numeric value representing the second observation.
